embedding.apiKey.label: Embedding API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: API key for your OpenAI-compatible embeddings endpoint (supports ${ENV_VAR})

embedding.baseUrl.label: Embedding Base URL
embedding.baseUrl.help: Base URL for an OpenAI-compatible embeddings API

embedding.model.label: Embedding Model
embedding.model.help: Embedding model name to call on the configured endpoint

embedding.dimensions.label: Vector Dimensions
embedding.dimensions.help: Optional for known models; required for custom models

chat.apiKey.label: Chat API Key
chat.apiKey.help: API key for the LLM used for memory decisions (supports ${ENV_VAR})

chat.baseUrl.label: Chat Base URL
chat.baseUrl.help: Base URL for an OpenAI-compatible chat API

chat.model.label: Chat Model
chat.model.help: Chat model for analyzing conversations and making memory decisions

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information via LLM analysis (requires chat config)

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context
